gen:link.msg:message: `BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen met `SeparateMember` en minimaal één keer met `ConsolidatedMember`, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` gelijk is aan `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST1')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST1 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST2')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST2 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` met `ConsolidatedMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` met `SeparateMember`, omdat `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` gelijk is aan `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set00DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set00DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set01BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set01BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set02BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set02BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
